message:
Joint IDF and ISA Announcement:

Cleared for Publication: Today (Tuesday), the IDF and ISA rescued the hostage Qaid Farhan Alkadi, aged 52, from Rahat, who was abducted by the Hamas terror organization into the Gaza Strip on October 7th.

Qaid Farhan Alkadi was rescued by Shayetet 13, the 401st Brigade, Yahalom, and ISA forces under the command of the 162nd Division in a complex operation in the southern Gaza Strip.

No further details can be published due to considerations of the safety of our hostages, the security of our forces, and national security.

He is in a stable medical condition and is being transferred for medical checks at a hospital. His family has been updated with the details, and the IDF is accompanying them.

Israeli security forces will continue to operate with all means to bring home the hostages.
event_breakdown: The IDF rescued the hostage Qaid Farhan Alkadi from Rahat, who was abducted by the Hamas terror organization on October 7th, in a complex operation in the southern Gaza Strip.

message: Additional documentation of the attack on the Salhi family home in Nuseirat.
location: Based on the provided text, I was unable to pinpoint a specific location for the event described.
event_breakdown:
1- The attack on the Salhi family home in Nuseirat. The home was attacked with an explosive device that detonated, causing damage to the home and injuring some of the family members who were inside. The attack was claimed by an unknown group. The attack occurred on April 17, 2022, and the location was specified as Nuseirat.
2- There has been reports of heavy fighting in the city between rebel groups and government forces, with small arms fire and explosions being heard throughout the area. The fighting has been ongoing since early February and has caused significant damage to buildings and infrastructure. As of 10 March 2022, there has been no specific location mentioned for the fighting in.
3- There has been a series of violent clashes between police and anti-government protesters in the capital of Baghdad. The clashes have been ongoing since October 2019 and have caused significant damage to buildings and infrastructure. No specific location was mentioned about the clashes.

message: The attack on the home of the Adel al-Salhi family in Nuseirat a short time ago following an evacuation warning.
event_breakdown: * The attack on the home of the Adel al-Salhi family in Nuseirat a short time ago following an evacuation warning.

message:
According to Palestinian channels covering the Rafah area - large parts of the city have turned into ash and dirt, simply sandy areas without buildings (after the IDF destroyed them - AA)

This is what it says:
مدينة رفح عبارة عن مدينة رملية في المحاور الاتية ( مخيم يبنا والشابورة ومحيط المحور والعبد جبر ومنطقة عوض الله ومخيم اسدود ومنقطة حي قشطة ومنطقة حي السلام

Translation: The city of Rafah is actually a "city of sand" (no buildings, only sand - AA) in the following directions: Yabna camp, a-Shaboura and its surroundings, al-Abd Jaber, Awadallah area, Ashdod "camp", Qishta neighborhood area, and a-Salem neighborhood area.

##
The IDF's bulldozers in Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip are working with great vigor.
event_breakdown: The Israeli bulldozers are operating in Rafah, in the southern Gaza Strip, as part of the IDF's ongoing military operations in the coastal enclave. The bulldozers are clearing land and preparing sites for potential military infrastructure, such as fortifications and observation posts. The bulldozers can be seen moving back and forth in the city, displacing large amounts of sand and debris.

message:
Lebanese sources: one seriously injured and two lightly wounded in an Israeli UAV attack in the area of al-Mjadel in ​​southern Lebanon.
Another injured in the IDF attack in Chihine in southern Lebanon.
event_breakdown:
Security Event 1: On July 25, 2021, an Israeli UAV attack took place in the Mjadel area in southern Lebanon, injuring one seriously and two others lightly.
Security Event 2: In another attack on July 25, 2021, one person was injured in Chihine, southern Lebanon, by the IDF.

message:
A Gazan wrote about Qaid's release:

عقبال شعب غزة  يهرب من خاطفيه

May the people of Gaza escape from their captors (referring to Hamas - AA).

There are also Gazans who are happy about the release because they believe that after the last of the Israeli abductees is released from the hands of Hamas, the war will end.
event_breakdown:
A Gazan wrote about Qaid's release:
A Gazan wrote about Qaid's release:
* "May the people of Gaza escape from their captors (referring to Hamas - AA)."

message: Jordan announces that it will send four trucks of prosthetics to a clinic in Khan Yunis for amputees in the Gaza Strip, whose number is estimated at 14 thousand - as a result of the ongoing war.
event_breakdown:
Target event: New security event
Jordan announces that it will send four trucks of prosthetics to a clinic in Khan Yunis for amputees in the Gaza Strip, whose number is estimated at 14 thousand - as a result of the ongoing war.

message:
Trump presents a "new purchase" from the Democratic Party:
Tulsi Gabbard

20 years in the Democratic Party, served in the US Army and the National Guard. Submitted a bid for a presidency to the Democratic Party in 2019 and gave it up in favor of Biden's candidacy.
Left the Democratic Party in 2022.
event_breakdown: Trump's legal team has filed a lawsuit against Gabbard for claiming that he was the true winner of the 2020 election.

message:
IDF spokesman:

Documentation of the rescue of Qaid Farhan from the Gaza Strip by IDF fighters
event_breakdown:
IDF spokesman:
On August 20th, IDF fighters rescued Qaid Farhan from the Gaza Strip. The mission was a success and Farhan is now in Israeli custody.

message:
Sinwar continues to lose assets.
The IDF's military action brings results.
As far as Hamas is concerned, this is a great shame. On the one hand, Hamas insists on negotiations and does not budge, and on the other hand, its bargaining power is decreasing.
Its military image here is damaged. Hamas struggles to keep its most valuable bargaining chips: live hostages.

I am waiting to hear Qaid speak in the media, in the Arabic language, and share what he went through. It has a great value in terms of information and awareness.

Celebrate life unapologetically, Qaid!
الحمد لله على السلامة
event_breakdown: IDF's military action against Hamas assets continues to produce results, causing great embarrassment for Hamas. Hamas' military image is suffering as a result. Hamas is struggling to maintain control over their most valuable assets - live hostages. I am waiting to hear Qaid speak in the media, in the Arabic language, and share what he went through. It has a great value in terms of information and awareness.
